name: Squawk - A space odyssey
description:
Beware! Squawk is a very hard game, are you manly enough to compete against space?

The space is a dangerous place with a lot of threats. Try to dodge planets and black holes to get as far as possible in a beautiful 8-bit style universe. Collect space tags to travel through space and time, to get to new galaxies and collect stars for upgrades and new ships! The universe is dangerous, are you brave enough to resist the danger and get the best astronaut out there?

Features:
- 8-bit retro style graphics
- different game modes
- collect stars to upgrade and buy new ships
- compete with the rest of the world with Google Play Service
- Complete missions for more stars
